name: Nikki Reed
body:
#![My Photo](http://41.media.tumblr.com/4edd6cd37c081e218ea5dc10dac1ad27/tumblr_inline_ntk4y0i0zX1qc0g9m_500.png) ![CV Page 1](https://40.media.tumblr.com/14ffa6814ca05863d813188b9a958741/tumblr_nz06o7kxn71qcrf0qo1_1280.jpg) ![CV Page 2](https://41.media.tumblr.com/95c23ab6a7b4cdf65f5fbeaf11b68a7f/tumblr_nz06o7kxn71qcrf0qo2_1280.jpg) ##

My name is Nikki Reed. Iâ€™m an MA Public History student at Northeastern University. I received my BA in Art History and English at Grand Valley State University. My interests are in Digital Archiving, Digital Curating, and Collections Management. In addition I have a background in Art Education and Fine Arts.

I curate an Art History blog, Women In Art History, that showcases women artists and subjects in art history.

You can find a link on this website to my current CV.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
